text: Carl Lindquist was a Chief Justice of the Montana Supreme Court in 1946. He was appointed after his predecessor Howard A. Johnson resigned. A Republican, he was elected to the Montana State Senate from Daniels County.https://sosmt.gov/Portals/142/Elections/archives/1950s/1954_Legislative_Assembly.pdf?dt=1523477333219 ==See also== *List of justices of the Montana Supreme Court ==References== Category:Justices of the Montana Supreme Court Category:20th-century American politicians Category:20th-century American lawyers Category:Montana state senators Category:Montana Republicans
title: Carl Lindquist (judge)
